page.title: 05The Shopping Centre, Thirsk
page.content: This area of trade includes the market place and some roads leading from it. We did several surveys to find out about this part of Thirsk. {Traffic Count:}Numbers and types of vehicles passing through the town in 2O minutes. {Northwards:}8O cars, 2l vans and lorries, 3 buses, 4 bicycles. {Southwards:}74 cars, l5 vans and lorries, l bicycle Most of the traffic was made up of cars and small vans Large lorries are able to avoid the town by using the By-Pass. However, it still seemed very busy. {Pedestrian Count:}People needing to cross the road, can use a Pedestrian Crossing. We found it was used very frequently. In just 20 minutes the lights changed 29 times, and l62 people crossed.
